sentence: In Wisconsin, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who is seeking the Democratic nomination for Senate, has released a TV ad focusing on abortion that ends with her saying: As your senator, I will never sit by and allow our rights to be stripped away. In North Carolina, for a Democrat to win statewide, strong turnout among Black voters as well as a significant share of suburban swing voters would likely be required.
author: Annie Linskey
title: In N.C., a Black woman brings up abortion in Senate run. Her Trump-backed rival doesnt.
